response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects its true worth while providing you with a substantial saving compared to its market value. I trust this proposition aligns well with your expectations and budget. I look forward to hearing your response soon.", "product_price": 12000}
